name: FIFA International Soccer
overview: WHAT A BLAST! EA SPORTS and the governing body of international soccer bring you the most realistic soccer game ever created for the Super NES. This is REAL Soccer - Brought to you EA Sports Style. - 30 International Teams - Real Soccer-Bicycle, Diving, Headers, and Slide Tackles. - Fully adjustable team formation, coverage, and strategy. - Super Stereo sound. - The most player animations of any sports game. - Referees throw out yellow and red cards for "dirty" play. - 5 player mode with Multi-Player Adapter. - Authentic crowd chants. - Take your favorite team through an international tournament, playoffs or exhibition.
